#id=1
#text=Yesterday during the day I decided to plant a tree with my friend Bob .
#id=2
#text=The first thing that we did was go and buy a little tree from the local Walmart .
#id=3
#text=We then went into my backyard and begun to did a hole .
#id=4
#text=We got the hole to about halfway the size we wanted it and decided to take a break for lemonade .
#id=5
#text=Next we continued digging , all the while I am contemplating the small part in ensuring an Eco friendly future .
#id=6
#text=As the sweat pours down my face we finish the hole .
#id=7
#text=Me and bob gently place the small tree in the hole .
#id=8
#text=Now we prepared for the truly fun part .
#id=9
#text=Putting back into the ground all the dirt that we had just put there .
#text=We filled the hole and then watered my new plant .
#text=After we finished me and Bob sat back with a beer overlooking this new tree that we had planted .
